DOC.brief_summary: This French Registry mandate French National Health Authority assess long-term ( 5-years ) safety GORE速 Excluder速 Endoprosthesis treatment infra-renal Abdominal Aortic Aneurysms ( AAA ) .
DOC.brief_title: GORE速 EXCLUDER速 Endprosthesis French Mandatory Registry
DOC.detailed_description: The use abdominal aortic endoprostheses make treatment infra-renal abdominal aortic aneurysm possible , implantation via femoral artery , thus avoid invasive surgical procedure . The French National Authority Health require 5-year follow-up part renewal reimbursement endprostheses .
DOC.criteria: Any patient require abdominal aortic stenting treatment unruptured infrarenal aortic abdominal aneurysm . Patients whose clinical followup possible , i.eg , patient return control visit ( e.g . patient live abroad ) .
